channel.title: Lab4 - CI/CD configuration on CI/CD
channel.description: Recent content in Lab4 - CI/CD configuration on CI/CD

item.title: Configure the .gitlab-ci.yml file in the project
item.description: Configure the CI/CD in the project In the root of the project you imported in lab2 there is already .gitlab-ci.yml file that includes build and test stages, and jobs in each stage. We will add one additional job to this configuration file, deploy: deploy will deploy the sample website to S3. Open the Web IDE. On the left, open the .gitlab-ci.yml file. You will notice stages keyword, with build, test and deploy stages.
